verses.verse: <S%G1161>It<s%> <S%G1096>happened<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium<s%> that <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2596>together<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G5620>that<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G4100>believed.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G544>disbelieving<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> stirred <S%G1892>up<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2559>embittered<s%> the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

<S%G3767%G99999>Therefore<s%> <S%G1304>they<s%> stayed there a <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G5550>time,<s%> speaking <S%G3955>boldly<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> who <S%G3140>testified<s%> to the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1325>granting<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%> to be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5495>hands.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G4977>divided.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> Part <S%G2258>sided<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> part <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G3303>apostles.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613%G99999>When<s%> some of <S%G5037>both<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G758>rulers,<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> a violent <S%G3730>attempt<s%> to <S%G5195>mistreat<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3036>stone<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%>

they became aware <S%G4894>of<s%> <S%G2703>it,<s%> and fled <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of <S%G3071>Lycaonia,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3082>Lystra,<s%> <S%G1191>Derbe,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the surrounding <S%G4066>region.<s%>
<S%G2546>There<s%> they preached the Good <S%G2258>News.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>At<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2521>sat,<s%> <S%G102>impotent<s%> in his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G5225><s%> a <S%G5560>cripple<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>'s <S%G2836>womb,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> had <S%G4043>walked.<s%>

<S%G3778>He<s%> was <S%G191>listening<s%> to <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> <S%G3739>who,<s%> fastening <S%G816>eyes<s%> on <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> to be made <S%G4982>whole,<s%>

<S%G2036>said<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G450>"Stand<s%> <S%G3717>upright<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet!<s%>" <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G242>leaped<s%> up <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4043>walked.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1492>When<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G4160>done,<s%> they lifted <S%G1869>up<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> in the language of <S%G3072>Lycaonia,<s%> "The <S%G2316>gods<s%> have come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> in the <S%G3666>likeness<s%> of <S%G444>men!<s%>"

<S%G5037>They<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2203>"Jupiter,<s%>" <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2060>"Mercury,<s%>" <S%G1894>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G2233>chief<s%> <S%G3303>speaker.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> of <S%G2203>Jupiter,<s%> whose temple <S%G5607>was<s%> in <S%G4253>front<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G5022>oxen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4725>garlands<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G4440>gates,<s%> and would <S%G2309>have<s%> made a <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> along <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes.<s%>

But <S%G191>when<s%> the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G1284>it,<s%> they tore <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>clothes,<s%> and <S%G1530>sprang<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> crying <S%G1161>out,<s%>

<S%G2532%G99999><s%> <S%G435>"Men,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> are <S%G4160>you<s%> doing these <S%G5023>things?<s%> <S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> of like <S%G3663>passions<s%> with <S%G5213>you,<s%> and <S%G2097>bring<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> good <S%G1994>news,<s%> that you should turn <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> vain <S%G3152>things<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that is in <S%G846>them;<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1074>generations<s%> gone <S%G3944>by<s%> <S%G1439>allowed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> to walk <S%G4198>in<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G3598>ways.<s%>

<S%G2544><s%> <S%G1065>Yet<s%> he <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G863>leave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> without <S%G267>witness,<s%> in that he did <S%G15>good<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2254>you<s%> <S%G5205>rains<s%> from the <S%G3771>sky<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2593>fruitful<s%> <S%G1705>seasons,<s%> filling <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> with <S%G5160>food<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2540>gladness.<s%>"

<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G2664>things,<s%> they <S%G3433>hardly<s%> stopped the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G3361>from<s%> <S%G2380>making<s%> a <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> some <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium<s%> came <S%G1904>there,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> having <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3034>stoned<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> and <S%G4951>dragged<s%> him out <S%G1854>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3543>supposing<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2348>dead.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> as the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> stood <S%G2944>around<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he rose <S%G450>up,<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city.<s%> <S%G2532>On<s%> the next <S%G1887>day<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1191>Derbe.<s%>

<S%G5037>When<s%> they had preached the Good <S%G2097>News<s%> to <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G3100>made<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G5290>disciples,<s%> they returned <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2430>Iconium,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%>

<S%G1991>confirming<s%> the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> exhorting <S%G3870>them<s%> to <S%G1696>continue<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> they had <S%G5500>appointed<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> for <S%G846>them<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1577>assembly,<s%> and had <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3521>fasting,<s%> they <S%G3908>commended<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they had <S%G4100>believed.<s%>
They passed <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G4099>Pisidia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3828>Pamphylia.<s%>
<S%G2532>When<s%> they had <S%G2980>spoken<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4011>Perga,<s%> they went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G825>Attalia.<s%>

From <S%G2547>there<s%> they <S%G636>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> from <S%G3606>where<s%> they had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G3860>committed<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> they had <S%G3854>arrived,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> had <S%G4863>gathered<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%> they <S%G312>reported<s%> all the things <S%G3745>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he had <S%G455>opened<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> to the <S%G1484>nations.<s%>
<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G1304>stayed<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> for <S%G3756>a<s%> <S%G3641>long<s%> <S%G5550>time.<s%>
